evidence.claim: Zeel integrates with EHRs supporting FHIR standards for interoperability.
Zeel is HIPAA compliant, ensuring secure handling of health information.
Zeel uses electronic transaction standards such as X12 and EDI for billing and claims processing.
Zeel mentions integration capabilities with various health systems, enhancing patient data accessibility.

icp.icp_reason: Zeel operates in healthcare tech with evidence of X12 and HIPAA compliance.
